Arizona Winter School 2015: Arithmetic and Higher-Dimensional Varieties

AWS 2015 will be held March 14-18, 2015 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Registration will open in November.
    The deadline to apply for funding is January 9, 2015.
  • Speakers:
    • Jean-Louis Colliot-Thélène: Local-global principle for rational points and zero-cycles
    • Ravi Vakil: Links between arithmetic and geometry: metaphor and motivation
    • Anthony Várilly-Alvarado: Arithmetic of K3 surfaces
    • Bianca Viray: Rational points on surfaces
  • Organizers: Rachel Pries and Matthew Papanikolas (main program), with Bryden Cais, Mirela Ciperiani, and Romyar Sharifi.
